Class-Bard 20 -- Female Versatile Human Bard: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +4 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +4 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +4
Background: Detective Deity: Pharasma
Experience: 19884/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 25 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Feather Step: Can Step into difficult terrain

Warrior: Has the Martial Performance feature

Multifarious Muse (Maestro): Can select maestro muse feats
Multifarious Muse (Polymath): Can select polymath muse feats
Multifarious Muse (Warrior): Can select warrior muse feats
Prescient Planner: Can retrieve an undeclared piece of adventuring gear from backpack once per shopping trip
Perception: +30 (wisdom; master)
Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +24 (dexterity; untrained) Fortune-Telling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +26 (charisma; trained)

Athletics: +24 (strength; untrained) Giant Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Plains Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Baking Lore: +32 (intelligence; legendary) Halfling Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +26 (wisdom; trained)
Bardic Lore: +28 (intelligence; expert) Intimidation: +24 (charisma; untrained) Sailing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)
Cave Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Labor Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained)

Languages: Aklo; Common; Diabolic; Elven; Empyrean; Jotun; Necril; Shadowtongue
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Baking Lore): Skill Legendary (Baking Lore)
Additional Lore (Engineering Lore): Skill Legendary (Engineering Lore)
Additional Lore (Military Lore): Skill Legendary (Military Lore)
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 8 from any)
Eclectic Skill: +20 on untrained skills
Intelligence Language Bonus: +4 Language Count
Multilingual: +2 Language Count
Perception Mastery: Perception Master
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Orc Lore): Skill Trained (Orc Lore)
Skill Training (Piloting Lore): Skill Trained (Piloting Lore)
Skill Training (Plains Lore): Skill Trained (Plains Lore)
Untrained Improvisation: +20 on untrained skill checks
Accompany: (R) R30' Successful Performance and sacrifice of a Focus Point or spell slot allows an ally to cast the triggering spell without expending a point or slot
Assured Knowledge: Can take an automatic 10 + proficiency bonus on any Recall Knowledge check
Bardic Lore: Can use Bardic Lore to attempt to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Clever Improviser: May attempt any skill untrained
Combat Reading: (1) Successful Occultism vs. the higher of the target's Deception or Stealth DC reveals a target weakness, poorest save, or highest resistance; critical success gives 2 of these, and critical failure gives false information
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures to Aid with expert skills are successes
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Eclectic Skill: Can attempt any skill requiring trained or expert proficiency
Enigma's Knowledge: Can Recall Knowledge using any skill as a free action once per rd
Esoteric Polymath: Can use Occultism to add spells to spellbook
Group Aid: (F) After Aiding an ally, Aids another on the same skill
Know-It-All: Successful Recall Knowledge checks give additional information
Leverage Connections: Can use Society to gain a meeting with an important figure or to exchange favors
Melodious Spell: (1) Subsequent spell cast gains the subtle trait
Schooled In Secrets: Can use Occultism to Gather Information about secret societies and to Impersonate a member
Sign Language: Knows the sign equivalents of understood languages
Soulsight: Has 60' imprecise spiritsense
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
True Hypercognition: (1) Uses up to 5 Recall Knowledge actions
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Versatile Performance: Can use Performance in place of Deception, Diplomacy, or Intimidation to Impersonate, Make An Impression, Demoralize, or to satisfy prerequisites
Virtuosic Performer: +1 checks on chosen Performance type
Combat
Hit Points: 248 Armor Class: 38 (dexterity (3 max); expert) Class DC: Bard: 36 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Padded Shield: None Weapons: Greatpick (+28 1d10+4 P [Crit d12]; strength; expert); Ranseur (+28 1d10+4 P; strength; expert); Rapier (+28 1d6+4 P [Crit +d8]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Bard Weapon Expertise: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +3
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Light Armor Expertise: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Unarmored Defense)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Orc Knuckle Dragger): Weapon Familiarity (Orc Knuckle Dragger)
Weapon Proficiency (Sawtooth Saber): Attack Expert (Sawtooth Saber)
All In My Head: (R) Changes the triggering damage to self from a non-death Strike or spell to nonlethal mental damage
Bard Weapon Expertise: Critical hits with a simple weapon, martial weapon, or unarmed attack inflict its critical specialization effect when a composition spell is active
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Emotional Push: (R) Foe who fails the triggering save vs. an emotion spell suffers off-guard against the next self attack before the end of the next turn
Reflexive Courage: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses an auditory effect, uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +2, +3, or +4 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +32 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Fortitude Expertise: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Greater Performer's Heart: Save Legendary (Will)
Performer's Heart: Save Master (Will)
Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Greater Performer's Heart: Critical failures on Will saves are normal failures and failed Will saves inflict half damage
Performer's Heart: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Reverberate: (R) Successful Performance vs. creature Will DC, hazard Fortitude DC, or caster spell DC reflects 40 HP sonic from the triggering effect back to its source, or 80 on a critical success
Well-Versed: +1 vs. auditory, illusion, linguistic, sonic, and visual effects
Magic
Spell Slots: O10: 2; O1: 3; O2: 3; O3: 3; O4: 3; O5: 3; O6: 3; O7: 3; O8: 3; O9: 3; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 3 Attack: Occult: +32 (charisma; legendary) Spell DC: Occult: 42 (charisma; legendary)
Spells:
Allegro (OC7 Foc): (1) R30' Target may take an additional Strike, Stride, or Step for 1 rd
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Dirge Of Doom (OC3 Foc): (1) 30' emanation inflicts frightened 1 on foes for 1 rd
Fatal Aria (O10 Foc): (1) R30' Kills a target up to level 16 or 50 HP, inflicts 0 HP and dying 1 on a level 17 target, or inflicts 50 HP on a level 18+ target
Fear (O1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Fortissimo Composition (O4 Foc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the effects of a subsequent Courageous Anthem, Rallying Anthem, or Song Of Strength to +2, or +3 on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
House Of Imaginary Walls (OC5 Foc): (1) Creates an adjacent invisible, illusionary, 10'x10' wall with Armor Class 10, double the spell rank Hardness, and quadruple the spell rank HP, for 1 rd
Hymn Of Healing (O1 Foc): (2) R30' Gives the target fast healing 2 and 2 temporary Hit Points each rd while sustained up to 4 rd (heightened +1 gives +2 fast healing and temporary Hit Points)
Lingering Composition (O1 Foc): (F) A successful Performance check increases the duration of a subsequent cantrip composition to 3 rd, or 4 rd on a critical success; failure does not expend a Focus Point
Loremaster's Etude (O1 Foc): (F) R30' Target may take the better of 2 rolls on the triggering Recall Knowledge check
Ode To Ouroboros (O5 Foc): (R) R60' Negates an increase in target's dying condition that would cause death
Phantasmal Minion (O1): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Pied Piping (O10 Foc): (2) 5' emanation fascinates creature and causes them to approach while sustained for up to 1 min; a hostile action ends the effect (save Will inflicts fascination only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts complete control)
Rallying Anthem (OC2 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class and saves, plus resistance of half the spell rank to physical damage, for 1 rd
Song Of Marching (OC3 Foc): (1) 60' emanation allows self and allies to Hustle and self to use Performance for initiate while sustained for up to 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last 2 hr; 9th effect last 4 hr)
Song Of Strength (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation give allies +1 Athletics and DCs vs. Athletics skill actions for 1 rd
Soothe (O1): (2) R30' Target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points and gains +2 saves vs. mental effects for 1 min (heightened +1 restores +1d10+4 Hit Points)
Soothing Ballad (O7 Foc): (2) R30' Self and 9 allies gain a counteract attempt on all fear effects, a counteract attempt on all paralysis effects, or 7d8 HP restored (heightened +1 restores +1d8 HP)
Sure Strike (O1): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Symphony Of The Unfettered Heart (O5 Foc): (2) R30' Uses Performance to counteract a choice of grabbed, immobilized, paralyzed, restrained, slowed, or stunned affecting target (heightened 9th affects 4 targets)
Triple Time (OC2 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +10' Speed for 1 rd
Uplifting Overture (OC1 Foc): (1) R60' Allows self to use Performance to Aid an ally skill check, with normal failure counting as a success, for 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Allegro: Knows the Allegro occult cantrip
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Dirge Of Doom: Knows the Dirge Of Doom occult cantrip
Enigma: Knows the Sure Strike occult spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Occult)
Fatal Aria: Knows the Fatal Aria occult spell
Fortissimo Composition: Knows the Fortissimo Composition occult spell
House Of Imaginary Walls: Knows the House Of Imaginary Walls occult cantrip
Hymn Of Healing: Knows the Hymn Of Healing occult spell
Legendary Spellcaster: Spell Legendary (Occult)
Lingering Composition: Knows the Lingering Composition occult spell
Loremaster's Etude: Knows the Loremaster's Etude occult spell
Maestro: Knows the Soothe occult spell
Master Spellcaster: Spell Master (Occult)
Ode To Ouroboros: Knows the Ode To Ouroboros occult spell
Perfect Encore: +1 10th rank spell slot
Pied Piping: Knows the Pied Piping occult spell
Polymath: Knows the Phantasmal Minion occult spell
Rallying Anthem: Knows the Rallying Anthem occult cantrip
Song Of Marching: Knows the Song Of Marching occult cantrip
Song Of Strength: Knows the Song Of Strength occult cantrip
Soothing Ballad: Knows the Soothing Ballad occult spell
Symphony Of The Unfettered Heart: Knows the Symphony Of The Unfettered Heart occult spell
Triple Time: Knows the Triple Time occult cantrip
Uplifting Overture: Knows the Uplifting Overture occult cantrip
Warrior: Knows the Fear occult spell
Annotate Composition: Can spend 10 minutes and a Focus Point to write a 1-action composition spell that can be activated by anyone until next daily prep
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Call And Response: (1) Allows allies to use an action to extend for 1 rd a subsequent composition cantrip that affects them
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Courageous Advance: (1) Subsequent Courageous Anthem casting allows 1 ally to use a reaction to Stride
Courageous Assault: (1) Allows a chosen ally affected by a subsequent Courageous Anthem to immediately use a reaction to make a melee Strike
Courageous Onslaught: (1) Subsequent Courageous Anthem allows 1 ally to immediately use a reaction to Stride and make a melee Strike
Deep Lore: Knows 1 additional spell of each rank
Defensive Coordination: (1) Subsequent cast of Rallying Anthem allows self and 1 target to Raise A Shield
Directed Audience: Can redirect the emanation of a composition spell into a cone up to 10' longer and twice the area
Discordant Voice: Strikes by allies affected by Courageous Anthem inflict +1d6 HP sonic
Earworm: 10 min process prepares allies to be affected by a composition cantrip with a successful Performance check
Eclectic Polymath: Can retain a chosen Esoteric Polymath spell in repertoire by removing a spell of the same rank
Educate Allies: (R) Allies affected by a composition spell gain +1, and self gains +2, vs. auditory, illusion, linguistic, sonic, and visual effects until the beginning of the next turn
Effortless Concentration: (F) Sustains an active spell
Esoteric Polymath: Can prepare 1 spell from spellbook during daily prep, treating it as an additional signature spell if it is in repertoire
Eternal Composition: Can use an additional action each rd to cast a 1-action composition cantrip
Harmonize: (1) Can have 2 composition spells active simultaneously
Impossible Polymath: Can add arcane, divine, and primal spells to spellbook if trained in the corresponding skill
In Tune: (1) R60' Subsequent composition spell emanation centers on a willing ally
Inspirational Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Magnum Opus: Knows 2 10th-rank occult spells
Martial Performance: Successful Strike while Courageous Anthem, Rallying Anthem, or Song Of Strength is active extends the spell by 1 rd
Quickened Casting: (F) Reduces the time required to cast a spell of rank 7 or lower by 1 action once per day
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Resounding Finale: (R) Ending a composition spell gives affected allies resistance equal to twice the spell's rank to the triggering sonic damage
Ritual Researcher: +2 on checks made as part of casting a ritual
Shared Assault: A critical hit by the target of Courageous Assault allows another ally affected by Courageous Anthem to immediately use a reaction to make a melee Strike
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Studious Capacity: Can cast 1 additional spell of rank 8 or lower each day
Symphony Of The Muse: Can have any number of composition spells active simultaneously
Triumphant Inspiration: (F) Casts a 1-action composition cantrip after inflicting a critical melee hit
Ultimate Polymath: All spells are signature spells
Unusual Composition: (1) Allows a subsequent visual or auditory spell to affect any sense
Versatile Signature: Can replace 1 signature spell during daily prep
Vigorous Anthem: (1) Subsequent Courageous Anthem gives self and allies 7 temporary Hit Points for 1 min
Notes
Validation Errors:
Bard Muse Allocation: 1 available vs. 4 allocated
Class Feats Allocation: 14 available vs. 72 allocated
Multifarious Muse (Enigma) Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 2 and enigma bard feature (currently 1) == 0
